input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Summit Men's Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Cargo Jersey'
  - Name='Colore Puro Long Sleeve Jersey Santini'
  - Name='Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Colore Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Sleeveless Moisture-Wicking Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Moisture-Wicking Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Santini Pirelli Unisex Slim Fit Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Colore Puro Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Pro Men's Midweight Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Tech Jersey - Conifer Chaos, 3XL | Cycling Jersey | Pedal Mafia'
  - Name='Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey'
  - Name='Women's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Core Racing Jersey'
  - Name='Women's Core Racing Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia 2022 Pro Bike Supply Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Flanders V4 Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal to Empower x Rapha Men's Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Lidl-Trek Jersey Man'
  - Name='Sportful Men's Strike Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Idea Jersey Man Short Sleeve'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Summit Men's Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a cycling jersey, but lacks detail on fabric or features; probably similar function and silhouette but less info on materials or pockets.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Cargo Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey with long sleeves and cargo pockets, likely similar construction and purpose; slightly different sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Colore Puro Long Sleeve Jersey Santini
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey, similar core purpose but not exact due to sleeve length and unclear fabric details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Ombra Eco Micro Polartec Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey with thermal Polartec fabric; more specialized for warmth rather than lightweight core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Colore Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard cycling jersey likely similar in silhouette and purpose; insufficient details on materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Sleeveless Moisture-Wicking Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sleeveless base layer rather than full jersey; different garment type despite moisture-wicking function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Moisture-Wicking Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer with long sleeves, different from a jersey; more of a layer under jersey than jersey itself.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Pirelli Unisex Slim Fit Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit cycling jersey similar in purpose and silhouette; likely comparable fabric tech and pockets as a core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Colore Puro Short Sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey with high similarity in function and form to reference core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact product matching reference; identical features and design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and category, likely very similar but possibly different model or features than core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Midweight Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey from same brand but thermal midweight suggests heavier fabric, less similar to lightweight core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pro Men's Midweight Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Midweight thermal jersey, heavier and warmer than core jersey designed for lighter use; different fabric tech.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tech Jersey - Conifer Chaos, 3XL | Cycling Jersey | Pedal Mafia
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand cycling jersey, likely sharing fabric tech and features, possibly a different style or print.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nomadic Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely not a cycling jersey but a tech t-shirt; different garment type, lacking cycling-specific construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Vapour Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's cycling jersey from same brand; similar technical features though gender-specific cut makes it slightly different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely women's version of the reference core jersey, very similar in fabric and function, but female tailoring.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Close to core jersey but racing model may have different fit or fabric weight; very similar overall.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely female racing style core jersey, very similar in silhouette and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia 2022 Pro Bike Supply Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specific edition of the core jersey from same brand, identical in key features and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Flanders V4 Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey same brand but different model; likely similar technical features but different styling or cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal to Empower x Rapha Men's Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Collaboration cycling jersey similar use but from different brand and possibly different materials, features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Lidl-Trek Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey from another brand; likely similar purpose and shape but different fabric and design focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Men's Strike Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve high performance cycling jersey similar in purpose and construction; comparable features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Idea Jersey Man Short Sleeve
